title: "Imported Beer from mexico" on Corona Beer label
content:
Can anyone tell me the font (or one that would be very similar) that is used for this text? Thanks so much!

Sorry the sample is so small—it’s the only one I could find.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [importedbeer.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185405/http:/typophile.com/files/importedbeer.jpg) | 5.86 KB |
author: tgoddess62

comments.content:
Hard to tell from the “mini-jpg”… but SOPHISTO could very well fit in;

[http://www.macrhino.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060821185405/http:/www.macrhino.com/)

Thank you, Stephan…I’m not sure the “M” quite right though. I’m not a professional graphic designer/artist, but this font seems (for lack of my not knowing the correct term) more rounded. If anyone has any alternate suggestions, I’d love to hear them. Otherwise, I’ll keep the one you suggested as a backup.

Claes…

Yes, that seems MUCH closer. Thanks.
